Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.GUI

Class GuiUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client.GUI.GuiUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientChatUpdater, ClientViewUpdater
public class GuiUpdater extends Object implements ClientViewUpdater, ClientChatUpdater
This class is responsible for updating the GUI based on the events received from the server
